reviewText: A movie that demonstrates one of the reasons why we can't get ahead of the race problem in this country.  Some items that we need to be able to talk honestly about so that we can all improve the lives of everyone in this nation,

A great film for any young black man coming of age in this society ...Great topics and details no unnecessary violence or gratuitous sex and all the points were driven home I just great young actor literally had me in tears. Stronglyrecommend
